resources.string:
DESCRIPTION: 
✦ Inside USM Main Campus near the Bukit Gambier entrance.
✦ Combination of two Desasiswa which are Desasiswa Aman Damai and Desasiswa Fajar Harapan.
✦ 8 blocks with 3 level of hostel blocks and 2 blocks with 4 level of hostel blocks.
✦ Official Desasiswa for Kor Sukarelawan Polis Siswa/Siswi(SUKSIS).

FELO AND ASSISTANT FELO:
✦ Tn Haji Mohd Zain Bin Dollah (mdzain@usm.my) 
✦ En. Mohd Zuaril Akimi Bin Mohd Shaari (mzakimi@usm.my)
✦ Cik Fauziah Bt Rastam (rfauziah@usm.my)

DESCRIPTION:
✦ Outside USM Campus near the Bukit Gambier entrance.
✦ Combination of three Desasiswa which are Desasiswa Tekun, Desasiswa Restu and Desasiswa Saujana.
✦ Desasiswa Saujana only have female student.
✦ Have Pedestrian Bridge to get into campus or get buses.
✦Have 6 block of 10 level of hostel block form block M07 until M09.

FELO AND ASSISTANT FELO:
✦ Ts. Dr. Shahrizal Bin Nazri(shahrizal@usm.my)
✦ En Mohd Rashid Abdul Rejab (rashid_rejab@usm.my)
✦ Puan Ezaleena Binti Mohd Khalid (ezza@usm.my)

DESCRIPTION:
✦ Inside USM Campus and closest entrance is Gelugor Entrance.
✦ Combination of two Desasiswa which are Desasiswa Bakti Permai and Cahaya Gemilang.
✦ 11 Block of hostel blocks.
✦ Providing apartment based housing for married student which is 107 unit of apartment.
FELO AND ASSISTANT FELO:\n✦ Encik Mohd Jaya Bin Mohd Johan (jaya_johan@usm.my) \n✦ Encik Zulkifli Bin Che Hussin (zulkiflich@usm.my)

DESCRIPTION:
✦ Inside USM Campus and Near the Bukit Gambier entrance and close to the Padang Kawad.
✦ 4 block of hostel block and 2 block of management and cafeteria.
✦ Official hostel for Kor Pasukan Latihan Pegawai Simpanan (PALAPES) Darat Dan Laut.

FELO AND ASSISTANT FELO:
✦ Puan Siti Hawa Mat Junoh (sitihawa@usm.my)
✦ Encik Mohd Shaifull Yunus
✦ Cik Hazwani Abdul Karim
